title: make: `basename` prints errors.
body:
## Bug Report
Compile the master branch with `make dist_release`, it reports the following errors:
```
[root@virtualmachine-5 tikv]# make dist_release
basename: 缺少操作数
请尝试执行 "basename --help" 来获取更多信息。
make build_dist_release
make[1]: 进入目录“/root/workspace/codes/tikv”
basename: 缺少操作数
请尝试执行 "basename --help" 来获取更多信息。
make x-build-dist
make[2]: 进入目录“/root/workspace/codes/tikv”
basename: 缺少操作数
请尝试执行 "basename --help" 来获取更多信息。
bash scripts/run-cargo.sh
using etc/cargo.config.dist
+ cp etc/cargo.config.dist .cargo/config
+ set +x
+ [[ -n 1 ]]
+ [[ 1 != \0 ]]
+ rustup component add rust-src
info: component 'rust-src' is up to date
+ cargo build --no-default-features --release --package=tikv-server --package=tikv-ctl '--features= pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure openssl-vendored' -Z build-std=core,std,alloc,proc_macro,test --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -Z unstable-options --out-dir=/root/workspace/codes/tikv/target/release
    Updating git repository `https://github.com/tikv/rust-rocksdb.git`
```
It reflected that the introduced `basename` was not used with a correct syntax.
And I found that it was introduced in pr e29eae2fdc984042671c93541499cb4c20241066:
https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/03499fff2e2bcb32cf33f76bc92f8b1cf3b4f0a3/Makefile#L167


<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
TiKV
Release Version: nightly
Edition: Community
Git Commit Hash: https://github.com/tikv/tikv/commit/03499fff2e2bcb32cf33f76bc92f8b1cf3b4f0a3
Git Commit Branch: master
Rust Version: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)


### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
Linux version 4.18.0-305.3.1.el8_4.x86_64 (mockbuild@ord1-prod-x86build003.svc.aws.rockylinux.org) (gcc version 8.4.1 20200928 (Red Hat 8.4.1-1) (GCC)) #1 SMP Thu Jun 17 07:52:48 UTC 2021

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
do not prints:
```
basename: 缺少操作数
请尝试执行 "basename --help" 来获取更多信息
```

### What did happened?
prints:
```
basename: 缺少操作数
请尝试执行 "basename --help" 来获取更多信息
```
